head.title: Rotate {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to rotate pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Easily modify PDFs, Word files, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint slides, images, and archives.

header.title: Rotate pages in {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: Enhance your {{EnvNameShort}} applications with {{ProdFullName}}, a powerful document processing solution. Rotate pages in {{FileFormatUp}} and manage various file formats effortlessly.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is an advanced document processing library that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. It provides features like merging, splitting, extracting, rearranging, and deleting pages to streamline document management in your applications.

more_features.title: Comprehensive document management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers a broad set of features, making it easy to handle over 50 commonly used business file formats.

feature_1.title: Merge multiple file formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, Visio diagrams, images, and archives. Use advanced options for precise control over the merging process.

feature_2.title: Rearrange document pages
feature_2.content: Easily move, swap, or remove pages to better organize your files.

feature_3.title: Customize page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between landscape and portrait orientation for better readability.

feature_4.title: Extract pages as separate files
feature_4.content: Select specific pages or a page range and save them as a new document in your preferred location.

formats.title: Rotate pages in multiple formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file types, allowing you to modify documents quickly with a variety of built-in operations.

operations.title: Core features
operations.description: Discover the powerful capabilities available in our document processing library.

examples.comment_1: Initialize {{NameProduct}} and load the source document
examples.comment_2: Specify the page number for rotation
examples.comment_4: Save the updated document to the desired location

content.title: With [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}), you can rotate pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents, bringing powerful document management to {{EnvName}} applications.
content.step_1: Provide the path to the {{FileFormatUp}} file.
content.step_2: Choose the page number you want to rotate.
content.step_4: Save the modified document to your desired location.

code_1.title: Rotate all even-numbered {{FileFormatUp}} pages
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to rotate every even-numbered page in a {{FileFormatUp}} document.
code_1.comment_1: Load the source document into the constructor
code_1.comment_2: Retrieve the total number of pages
code_1.comment_3: Configure settings to rotate even pages by 180 degrees
